entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 8:07 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
